Reviews.Title: THIS THING IS LOUD!!!
Reviews.Author: Ham-one
Reviews.Content: Bought for mother-in-law who said she could not hear her alarm siren in her room when her door was closed. Not the case now! WOW! This small sounder is very inconspicuous, but very up front when it needs to be. She'll have no problems hearing this. Great product. Simple wiring. Moderate install.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Jeff Hamm
Reviews.Content: Screamer is definitely the right word to describe this little siren.  You will not want to be anywhere near this thing when it goes off.  Exactly what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: No chance chance of sleeping through this!
Reviews.Author: Moezon2
Reviews.Content: Needed an interior siren for my alarm system that would be close to the bedrooms and require little power.  This siren did the trick.  There's no chance anyone could sleep through this and it only uses 175 milliamps.

Reviews.Title: piezo siren
Reviews.Author: H. Dusanjh
Reviews.Content: It makes a fair amount of noise for its small size. It does not draw a alot of current . It is made by GE so it should last a while. Overall I would recommend it for someone who does not want to deal with installing a full blown siren

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, loud
Reviews.Author: Michael ONeill
Reviews.Content: I used this with my vacation home's GE Simon XT alarm, easy hookup and very loud.I resort to using the remote keyfob now to set it as this thing is deafening when it chirps on exit.

Reviews.Title: security horn
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: very good horn ,very loud,low current draw,only problem i had with it was it appeared desinged for a 1 gang box,but it will not go flush too the wall ,extending away from wall approx .25".however it looks ok and maybe designed this way.it does not require a electrical box for installation for its limited voltage & currant.without the use of a box it will be a flush installation.
